import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useLocation, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const UpdateCompany = () => { // props of company const location = useLocation() let company = location.state.company const { companyName, date, employees, headquarter, owner, pin, _id } = company // setting old state to new state const [updatedData, setUpdatedData] = useState( { companyName: null, owner: null, pin: null, headquarter: null, }) // on change hendler const onChange = (e) => { setUpdatedData({ ...company, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } // submitting form const onSubmit = (e) => { } return (
